text: It's usually good service, but today was horrible. When I got there the lobby was full of people waiting for carry out orders. Some who had been there 40 minutes just waiting. Once I got my food it WAS fresh to my surprise though. And they gave me twice the amount of wings than I ordered, I'm assuming to make up for taking so long.
